play

method public void play() this methods starts the first round.

doComputerRound

private void doComputerRound()
private void doComputerRound() Computers are controlled by a state machine, on a separate Thread. The run() function of the Thread directs the computer player to take appropriate actions, depending on the current state (depicted by the field "state". The function also resets the state when the player is done.

private void rollDie()
method private void rollDie() this method rolls the die.

method public boolean rollForADouble() this is a method to be used by jail square.

Returns:

movePlayer

private void movePlayer(Player player,
                        int currDieSum,
                        boolean getBonus)
Method private void movePlayer(Player player, int currDieSum, boolean getBonus) this method moves a player on the game board

Parameters:
player - - a non null player who is in the game to be moved
currDieSum - - a number from 2 to 12 - how many steps should the player take
getBonus - - true if the player should get a bonus if he goes thru start. false otherwise

Parameters:
player - - a non null active player to be moved
type - - a class which extends Square
getBonus - - true if the player should get a bonus if he goes thru start. false otherwise

removePlayerFromGame

public void removePlayerFromGame(Player player)
public void removePlayerFromGame(Player player) This method calls removePlayerFromGame(Player player, boolean gameAborted) with the boolean as false, for when the game is not aborted.

Parameters:
player - a non null active player to be removed

removePlayerFromGame

public void removePlayerFromGame(Player player,
                                 boolean gameAborted)
method public void removePlayerFromGame(Player player) this method safely removes a player from game (returns all his assets to treasury ,demolish houses and so on)

Parameters:
player - a non null active player to be removed
gameAborted - a boolean to signify if removing player due to a starting a new game.
